Marshall Impeachment Case.
Argued November 22, 1949.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Edwin P. Rome, with him Franklin Poul, William A. Gray and Gray, Anderson, Schaffer A Rome, for appellant.

November 23, 1949:
